22-009TI.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes from the Technology & Innovation Commission meeting held Wednesday, March 23, 2022.This agenda item was approved.Yes: 4 - Justin Hectus, Gwen Shaffer, Parisa Vinzant and David FerrellExcused: 2 - Lisa Mae Brunson and Robb Korinke22-010TIRecommendation to receive and file a progress report on the Technology & Innovation Commission white paper titled "Analysis and recommendations for regulating facial recognition technology and other "smart" devices and platforms", and to provide an update on the 2.Page 1 of 4TELECONFERENCE, 3:30 PMWEDNESDAY, APRIL 27, 2022CITY OF LONG BEACHTECHNOLOGY AND INNOVATION COMMISSION MINUTESpresentation to the Equity and Human Relations Commission.Chair Gwen Shaffer, spoke.Commissioner Parisa Vinzant, spoke.Chair Gwen Shaffer, spoke.Commissioner Parisa Vinzant, spoke.Chair Gwen Shaffer, spoke.Commissioner Parisa Vinzant, spoke.This item was approved.Yes: 5 - Lisa Mae Brunson, Justin Hectus, Gwen Shaffer, Parisa Vinzant and David FerrellExcused: 1 - Robb Korinke3.
